entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with drizzle near noon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:03 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
